name: Anime Fight in the Arena of Death
name_original: Anime Fight in the Arena of Death
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
A fun and addictive game in the style of beat'em'up with amazing physics. Perform dizzying tricks to defeat all opponents.

Anime Fight in the Arena of Death is a duel with yourself. Where it is necessary in unequal combat, to fight with crowds of opponents.

Gaining points, you rise higher and higher, confronting simultaneously more and more enemies. To overcome all adversity and score the maximum number of points, you need to win the fight. To win a lot. To win a lot ...

Unleash your potential, without clues, just hardcore. By trial and error, learn to fight! And nothing should stop you!

★ amazing tricks
★ realistic physics
★ Exclusive soundtrack
★ Hardcore gameplay
